page.title: 05SHIREBROOK COLLIERY cont'd
page.content: Q. What safety routines do the safety officers have to carry out each day? A. All the men are responsible for their own safety in general. There are 150 deputies at the pit who must, by law, examine each district every day. Q. Is there only one big shaft in the pit? A. No. By law there must be at least 2. Q. If things get very difficult do men dig coal out by hand? A. yes. men still occasionally have to {win}coal by hand. Q. How many machines do you have working down the pit? A. 11. Q. How much coal does the colliery produce roughly in one year. A. 1.8 million tons.
